name: Stealth Doggo
description:
Stealthily eat as many treats as you can in the time limit as a little doggo!
Avoid being seen eating a treat or you'll get pet and waste time :(

  • Play as a dog!
  • Eat everything before the time runs out!
  • Avoid being seen eating treats
  • Use large objects casting shadows to hide
  • 3 outfits!
  • 4 Levels!
  • 4 Colors from the CGA color palette!
  • Low resolution wide screen gameplay!
  • HTML5 - Built with PixiJS and ToneJS

Controls

  • Keyboard: Use Left and Right arrow keys or A and D keys
  • Play on your phone! Use the touch controls on either side of the screen. 

Project History:
Originally developed for Low Res Jam but never submitted. Instead we decided  to spend more than the allotted time, adding 3 levels, scrolling backdrops, develop the character AI and added simple sound effects.

Adheres to our fictional mid 80s 8bit hardware spec "Paca System 8" supporting 2 background scroll planes, 2 foreground planes (max 32 sprites), 4 colors, maximum resolution of 192x128, and 4 way polyphonic FM synthesis.
